entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear in the evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 23 March 2023
